meta_description: 31 years old front-end developer and web designer, based in Padua, Venice area.
intro_title:
Front-end developer
with a crush for design
and interface animation.

profile.title: 01/ Profile
profile.text:
31 years old, based in Padua, Venice area.

I do on a daily basis (semantically structured) HTML, (well designed) CSS and (efficient) JavaScript, enjoying the crossroad of code and design. I work with Sketch, Adobe XD, Photoshop, Illustrator, Blend4Web, Gulp, SASS, GSAP, Vue.js…

My background is in cinema studies and communication.

entries.title: Front-end developer / designer
entries.description: Building bold stuff for brands that think big. I take part in multidisciplinary creative projects fine-tuning their digital outcome, paying specific attention on visual details and performance.

entries.title: Front-end developer / designer
entries.description: Helping to translate companies strategic needs into tailor made digital solution. Focusing mainly on front-end development, my role is to make user centered experiences that work.

entries.title: Front-end developer
entries.description: De(code) Simone's design vision into performant websites and landing pages.

entries.title: React School
entries.description: A few days in a small group, nerding out about ES6, tooling, React, React Native...

entries.title: Workshop Ionic framework
entries.description: Angular and Ionic full immersion workshop, following the creation of a real hybrid mobile app.

entries.title: Press Office
entries.description: Press office and communication for Padua's municipality cultural exhibitions (RAM, Galileo Award). Event management.

entries.title: Research and development
entries.description: R&D, showing organization and online platforms distribution of film productions made during Kinocchio Lab.

entries.title: Interactive Media for Interior Design
entries.description: Master degree focused on digital innovation in the interior design sector: a leap into 3D modeling, photorealistic rendering, interaction design, video mapping.

entries.title: Web Design
entries.description: One year long professional course centered on web design and development.

entries.title: Performing Arts and Multimedia Productions
entries.description: Visual culture, film and new media studies to learn how to see the world.

entries.title: Communication Sciences
entries.description: Public communication, marketing and new media studies.
